review. 
On 
Mon, Nov 2, 2020 at 1:37 PM

Hughes, 
wrote: 
Thanks very much. We are free at 2 p.m. on Wednesday, and if that works for you we can use this conference 
line 
Thanks, 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Nov 2, 2020, at 10:54 AM, Dawn Hughes wrote: 
Yes. I would be happy to speak with you all. I have some open time on Wednesday after 2:00. Let 
me know what works for 
you. 
Best, 
Dr. Hughes 
DAWN M HUGHES, PHD ABPP 
CLINICAL AND FORENSIC PSYCI IOI OGIST 
On 
Thu, Oct 29, 2020 at 3:48 P te: 
EFTA00024758

Dr. Hughes, 
Together with colleagues 'm one of the federal prosecutors 
handling the case of United States v.  Ghislaine Maxwell, which is scheduled to go to trial on July 12, 2021 
in the Southern District of New York. We would be interested in speaking with you about your availability 
to testify as an expert witness at trial. Are you available for a call tomorrow or next week to discuss? 
Thanks very much, 
EFTA00024759
